name: majicMIX horror
description:
这个黑暗的模型擅长做有创意的恐怖图片。This dark model is great at creating creative horror images.

推荐的promts: horror art, dread, creepy, bloody, gore…关于恐怖的一切都能尝试。

Recommended prompts: horror art, dread, creepy, bloody, gore ... everything about horror can be explored.

mixed with hobolyra's DREAD V4

想看更多恐怖AI可以关注我的TG频道 https://t.me/majic_horror

也可以加入我的TG恐怖AI讨论组 https://t.me/+YEB-REeOIFRmNGRl

想看NSFW的可以关注 https://t.me/majic_NSFW

meta.prompt: horror art, dread, Best quality, masterpiece, ultra high res, (photorealistic:1.4), Action shot of terrifying human entity chasing after the viewer, dynamic running, in a decrepit underground tunnel in Hell, creepy, unnerving, unsettling, terrifying, 80mm, horror lighting, dynamic action <lora:kayako:0.7>
